name: Jack Dorsey
title: Former CEO & Founder
archetypeDescription: Meditates for 2 hours daily while his platforms burn. Namaste.

moves.name: Silent Retreat
moves.effect: Disappears for a month, company continues without noticing

moves.name: Edit Button Denial
moves.effect: Refuses to add obvious feature for 15 years

flavor: Built a platform for free speech, then spent a decade trying to figure out what that means.
bangerQuote: Ran two public companies part-time while doing ice baths and fasting. Peak Silicon Valley monk energy.
naturalRival: Anyone who asks why Twitter didn't have an edit button for 16 years
roastBullets: Was CEO of two companies simultaneously and both somehow felt neglected
His content moderation strategy was 'meditate on it and hope it goes away'
Sold Twitter to Elon, then spent the next year subtweeting about how it's being run
Walks to work barefoot, eats one meal a day, and wonders why people think he's out of touch
